targets.query:
import "timezone"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Asia/Kolkata")

from(bucket: "market_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "index_overview" and r._field == "price")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","index"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

import "timezone"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Asia/Kolkata")

from(bucket: "market_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "option_data" and r._field == "last_price")
  |> group(columns:["symbol","expiration","option_type","strike"])
  |> last()
  |> sort(columns: ["symbol","strike"])
